page.title: 04Schools in St. Andrews
page.content: There are seven schools in St. Andrews. Five of these are state schools administered by Fife Regional Council, including one secondary school and four primary schools.{ {Madras College,}accommodated in two buildings, one in South street and one in Kilrymont Road, is the secondary school.The primary schools are{ {Canongate, Langlands, Lawhead and {Greyfriars}which is a Roman Catholic School.All the other schools are non_denominational. {St. Leonards}is a private secondary school for girls and it also houses a preparatory department called{St. {Katherines.}There is a small private co_educational school called{New Park. All these private schools take both day puplis and boarders. There are{Nursery Classes}in{ {Canongate, Greyfriars}and{New Park.
